author: Thuá»· LÃª Ngá»c
comment: The story is that in a land with a magnificent castle with solid walls surrounded. A little princess named Lily lived in the care of her parents, the little girl was very shy and scared about the vast world out there. Then, growing and growing, she wanted to leave her boring life and run to the world she used to be afraid of. She longed to find something like a colorful fairy tale and the magic she had read through. She fled the castle, followed the call along the streams, chased butterflies and then by the time she realized the sun had set to make way for the still night, she had strayed into an area. dark forest. Frightenedly, remembering the tales of the horrors in the woods, she ran helplessly in vain. Then something that saw her was fascinated by her beautiful art, it crept to her side. He told her to give him love and he would give her miracles like fairy tales, which would lead her everywhere she wanted. She was captivated by the beauty of it, and she fled awake and screamed for help in vain. Her cry drew the monsters around her. The creature just now saved her safely, it only begged for love. She placed a kiss on it, it shone away. Under the bright sunlight shining through the trees of the jungle, before her eyes was ... a fairy tale of her own.
